thread.title: Apple is building an electric car
thread.title_full: Apple is building an electric car

title: Apple is building an electric car
text:
Report: Apple to build electric car for 2019 HARRY TUCKER news.com.au Report: Apple to build electric car for 2019 HARRY TUCKER news.com.au What’s Tim Cook planning? 
CAR companies look out. Apple is investing more money, hiring more people and spending more time developing an electric car, according to a new report. 
The maker of iPhones and iPads is tripling the number of engineers on the project, codenamed Titan, and has set a “ship date” of 2019, the Wall Street Journal says. 
The newspaper said that could just be a target for engineers to sign off on the design, not necessarily when a car would be available for sale. Other Stories
